student-prompt-01: Decode the job market! Get data-driven insights on the top 5-7 skills employers actually want, plus standout certifications, learning resources, and your first focus area to land that entry-level role!
student-prompt-02: Stop guessing about electives! Use the VIP framework to validate market demand, investigate career impact, and position yourself strategically—get a data-backed decision on whether this course is worth your time!
student-prompt-03: Bridge theory to practice! Transform classroom concepts into portfolio-ready projects with beginner, intermediate, and advanced exercises—plus industry examples that show employers you can actually DO the work!
student-prompt-04: Unlock your memory superpowers! Get custom mnemonics, memory palaces, chunking strategies, and spaced repetition schedules to remember complex information faster and retain it longer for exams and beyond!
student-prompt-05: Master your time like a pro! Get a science-backed study schedule that balances memory retention, energy levels, and real life—complete with specific time blocks, break strategies, and progress tracking!
student-prompt-06: Turn classroom learning into career currency! Discover how your coursework translates to job skills, get resume bullet points that pop, and prep interview stories that prove you're workplace-ready!
student-prompt-07: Build your skill blueprint! Get a stage-by-stage development plan from beginner to career-ready with clear milestones, actionable steps, learning resources, and portfolio projects tailored to your goals!
student-prompt-08: Create a portfolio that wins jobs! Turn class projects into professional case studies with compelling narratives, visual impact, measurable results, and field-specific formats that hiring managers love!
student-prompt-09: Discover YOUR perfect career path! Answer targeted questions to reveal your best-fit skills, must-learn priorities, nice-to-have extras, and curated resources matched to your unique situation and goals!
student-prompt-10: Paste your notes, get study magic! Transform messy course material into organized guides with key concepts, definitions, exam questions, memory tips, and connections—scannable and review-ready in minutes!
student-prompt-11: Conquer networking like a boss! Get your personalized elevator pitch, smart conversation starters, thoughtful questions to ask, and professional follow-up templates that turn contacts into opportunities!
student-prompt-12: Transform feedback into career fuel! Turn criticism into actionable improvement plans with specific steps, learning resources, timelines, progress tracking, and professional thank-you responses!
student-prompt-13: Cramming crisis solved! Build a self-testing study engine using active recall—get brain dump exercises, Q&A formats, gap-filling strategies, and visual memory anchors when you're short on time!
student-prompt-14: Master any subject with cognitive science! Get structured guides featuring key terms, self-quiz questions, visual maps, and spaced repetition plans proven to boost retention and long-term understanding!
student-prompt-15: Perfect study guide for YOUR exam type! Choose from problem-solving blueprints, essay argument builders, or memorization masters—tailored strategies that match exactly how you'll be tested!
advisor-prompt-01: Empower advisors with market intelligence! Get comprehensive skill tables, emerging trends, gap analysis, and must-have vs. differentiator breakdowns to provide data-driven career guidance students can trust!
advisor-prompt-02: Validate course value with proof! Analyze real job postings, gather industry evidence, and develop strategic positioning recommendations—give students confident answers backed by hard data!
advisor-prompt-03: Turn theory into practice instantly! Design 3-5 portfolio-worthy projects with step-by-step guides, grading rubrics, skill progressions, and clear career connections that prepare students for real work!
advisor-prompt-04: Master culturally-responsive advising! Understand diverse student challenges, build authentic trust, navigate systemic barriers, and deliver exceptional support that helps every student succeed!
advisor-prompt-05: Plot semester-by-semester success! Create integrated four-year roadmaps combining courses, internships, skill development, and career milestones—transforming vague goals into actionable graduation plans!
advisor-prompt-06: Transform experiences into credentials! Generate powerful resume bullets, compelling STAR stories, LinkedIn copy, and interview coaching strategies that help students articulate their value to employers!
advisor-prompt-07: Build career-ready proficiency pathways! Design stage-by-stage skill development plans with learning resources, practice projects, assessment checkpoints, and realistic timeline estimates for student success!
advisor-prompt-08: Master portfolio advising strategies! Get field-specific formats, content recommendations, quality review checklists, and feedback scripts that help students create portfolios that actually get them hired!
advisor-prompt-09: Walk into tough meetings confident! Get student background research, conversation guides, resource referrals, collaborative problem-solving frameworks, and backup plans for complex advising situations!
advisor-prompt-10: Turn audit confusion into clarity! Generate smart semester plans, identify backup options, assess graduation risks, and create on-time degree completion strategies—navigate requirements like a pro!
study-guide-prompt-00: Build lecture notes that actually work! Active recall questions, dual coding visuals, spaced repetition schedules—cognitive science for maximum retention!
study-guide-prompt-01: Triple your retention with interleaved practice! Mix problem types strategically, force pattern recognition, and build deep understanding—no more blocked practice that fades after exams!
study-guide-prompt-02: Unlock optimal spacing intervals! Get personalized review schedules based on cognitive science—10-20% retention intervals proven to cement knowledge for the long haul!
study-guide-prompt-03: Master complex procedures with worked examples! Build understanding through self-explanation, scaffold from simple to complex, and develop expert-level problem-solving skills fast!
study-guide-prompt-04: Diagnose your knowledge gaps before exam day! Identify weak spots, prioritize study time wisely, and build targeted review plans that fix what's actually broken!
study-guide-prompt-05: Double-code your learning for maximum retention! Combine visual and verbal channels, create dual-representation study materials, and leverage both sides of your brain!
study-guide-prompt-06: Optimize cognitive load for faster learning! Chunk information strategically, sequence concepts logically, and reduce mental strain—study smarter, not harder!
study-guide-prompt-07: Think about your thinking! Design metacognitive study sessions with reflection prompts, comprehension checks, and learning strategy adjustments for continuous improvement!
study-guide-prompt-08: Turn mistakes into mastery! Analyze error patterns, identify conceptual gaps, and build targeted practice that fixes recurring problems at their root!
study-guide-prompt-09: Build a retrieval practice question bank! Generate self-testing materials that strengthen recall, reveal weak spots, and prepare you for any exam format!
study-guide-prompt-10: Ask 'why' to deepen understanding! Use elaborative interrogation to connect concepts, build causal chains, and create rich mental models that stick!
study-guide-prompt-11: Adapt your study plan to your expertise level! Get beginner scaffolding or advanced challenge—tailored approaches that meet you exactly where you are!
study-guide-prompt-12: Match study strategies to assessment types! Prep differently for multiple-choice, essays, problems, or practicals—targeted tactics for maximum performance!
study-guide-prompt-13: Transform lecture notes into retrieval powerhouses! Convert passive review into active testing with cues, questions, and self-explanation prompts!
study-guide-prompt-14: Get discipline-specific practice protocols! Whether STEM, humanities, or professional fields—study methods proven to work in YOUR subject area!
study-guide-prompt-15: Master final week integration! Connect isolated topics, build big-picture understanding, and create comprehensive review materials when it counts most!
study-guide-prompt-16: Emergency cramming optimizer (when all else fails)! Prioritize high-yield content, use rapid encoding techniques, and maximize limited time strategically!
study-guide-prompt-17: Conquer test anxiety with integrated strategies! Combine stress management with smart study tactics, build confidence through preparation, and perform your best under pressure!
study-guide-prompt-18: Map concept connections visually! Build networks showing relationships, hierarchies, and dependencies—see the big picture and understand how ideas link!
study-guide-prompt-19: Master formulas and procedures with decision trees! Know exactly when to use what, eliminate confusion between similar methods, and execute flawlessly!
study-guide-prompt-20: Optimize study sessions around your sleep schedule! Leverage sleep-dependent memory consolidation, time reviews strategically, and wake up smarter!
student-wellness-prompt-01: Conquer stress before it conquers you! Build your personalized toolkit with in-the-moment techniques, daily practices, and early warning systems that actually work!
student-wellness-prompt-02: Transform your sleep from survival mode to success mode! Get the 4-week protocol for consistent, quality sleep that fuels your brain and grades!
student-wellness-prompt-03: Turn loneliness into belonging! Master the connection ladder from micro-interactions to real friendships—research shows it takes 50-200 hours, here's your roadmap!
student-wellness-prompt-04: Take control of money stress! Build a realistic budget, cut costs strategically, and access campus resources most students don't know exist!
student-wellness-prompt-05: Reclaim your time from your phone! Purge notifications, create device-free zones, and feel more present in just 2-3 weeks!
student-wellness-prompt-06: Prevent burnout before you crash! Identify your rest deficits across 7 types, reduce the load, and rebuild your energy systematically!
student-wellness-prompt-07: Balance work and school without burning out! Strategic course planning, efficiency hacks, and protected rest days for the 70% of students who work!
student-wellness-prompt-08: Build a sustainable mindfulness practice! Start with 3-5 minutes of breath awareness and grow from there—no special talent required, just consistent practice!
student-wellness-prompt-09: Find joyful movement that you'll actually do! Forget punishment workouts—discover activities that feel good, boost mood 47%, and become habits you love!
student-wellness-prompt-10: Master difficult conversations with DEAR MAN! Set boundaries, use 'I' statements, and create relationships based on respect, not resentment!
student-wellness-prompt-11: Understand your procrastination to overcome it! It's not laziness—it's emotional regulation. Get targeted interventions for YOUR procrastination type!
student-wellness-prompt-12: Build wellness that honors your identity! Access culturally-competent support, find your community, protect your energy, and combat imposter syndrome!
student-wellness-prompt-13: Create your personal safety net before crisis hits! Build warning systems, crisis contacts, and coping strategies—proactive care, not just reactive help!
student-wellness-prompt-14: Master sustainable self-care (not Pinterest fantasies)! Start micro, build gradually—focus on the basics that keep you functional, not overwhelmed!
student-wellness-prompt-15: Go from isolated to connected with a realistic timeline! Weeks 1-4 build confidence, months 3-6 deepen friendships—small consistent actions create belonging!
student-wellness-prompt-16: Plan wellness into your semester before stress hits! Map high-stress periods, schedule recovery, and prevent burnout proactively—not reactively!
student-wellness-prompt-17: Build a layered support network that actually works! Different people meet different needs—academic, emotional, practical, social. Don't rely on just one person!
student-wellness-prompt-18: Manage anxiety with evidence-based tools! In-the-moment techniques, cognitive reframing, and lifestyle changes—your overactive alarm system can be turned down!
student-wellness-prompt-19: Eat well on a student budget! Rice, beans, eggs, and frozen veggies = complete nutrition for $1-3 per item. Good enough beats perfect every time!
student-wellness-prompt-20: Identify which of 7 types of rest you're missing! Physical, mental, sensory, creative, emotional, social, spiritual—different exhaustions need different rest!
